title: Ep. 59: Bear Grease [Render] - The Game Warden’s Here
itunes:title: Ep. 59: Bear Grease [Render] - The Game Warden’s Here
description:
On this episode of the Bear Grease [Render],  Clay Newcomb and the crew are joined by Lt. Ep Fletcher of the Arkansas Game and Fish Commission. They discuss wildlife regulations and some of the most memorable moments in his career. Fletcher describes how he evaluates each violation with three specific questions: what was the intent, how does it effect the resource, and how does it impact public safety. Ep ends the podcast with a moving story about a game warden who lost his life in a water evacuation.


Connect with Clay and MeatEater
